page.title: 01YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Mrs Slough came to talk to us about Sandown Youth Centre. She works as a Youth Leader. At first they let us have two grotty classrooms in the High{SCHOOL}for the {YOUTH CLUB}with no toilets. Now we use the Town Hall. The town hall disco room used to be a{MORGUE}where they used to put the dead bodies. They put a nice shiny floor for the disco. Martin Rousse is the boss and there are a lot more helpers. In the games room they've got a big floor for rough games and there is a stage when you take the boards out. In the changing room for the girls there's a door. That door is a fire exit door but people say there's a {GHOST}down there, but there isn't really. We have two snooker tables, one for snooker and one for pool.
